title: Yasou has a friend coming to SR?
body:
New updated lore on a new maybe upcoming champion? 
Earth weaver?
Let's see what we get!

replies.body:
Yasuo is wearing her clothes :O

always wondered why he never let his hair down

its so his massive hair doesnt get in his face when his whirling around doing yasuo things xD.

EDIT: oh but then theres {{champion:55}}.
keep it out using the wind. He used the wind in the story to keep his hair out of his face before he got her cloth. And to catch her. And to move stuff. The wind does more than cut things.

Based on the lore, she will have bump skill.
Well then.. with the incoming mage update patch 6.9, there will be more and more champs to ban

GG adc mains
